/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. Overhead, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural diversity.
